item.title: Hailstone
item.description: 算法有穷性 function hailstone(n) { var length = 1; while( n > 1) { if ( n % 2 ) { n = 3 * n + 1; } else { n /= 2; } length++; } return length; } // hailstone(42) = { 42, 21, 64, 32, ..., 1}
